account.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID to grant access to.

allowedAllVpcs.description: Indicates whether all VPCs in the grantee account are allowed access to the cluster.

clusterIdentifier.description: The cluster identifier of the cluster to grant access to.

endpointCount.description: The number of Redshift-managed VPC endpoints created for the authorization.

forceDelete.description: Indicates whether to force the revoke action. If true, the Redshift-managed VPC endpoints associated with the endpoint authorization are also deleted. Default value is `false`.

grantee.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the grantee of the cluster.

grantor.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the cluster owner.

vpcIds.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) identifiers to grant access to. If none are specified all VPCs in shared account are allowed.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering EndpointAuthorization resources.
